All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Administrator
The Administrator class represents a user with administrative privileges in the hospital system.
AdministratorController
The AdministratorController class handles the core functionalities for the administrator, including managing staff, inventory, and appointments.
AdminView
The AdminView class implements the IAdministratorView interface and provides methods for displaying administrator-related views and gathering user input.
AllocatedAppointmentView
Represents a view for displaying allocated appointments for a patient.
Appointment
Represents an appointment in the healthcare system.
AppointmentController
The AppointmentController class provides an interface for managing appointments.
AppointmentHistoryView
View class to display the appointment history of a patient.
AppointmentOutcomeRecordView
A view class to load and display appointment outcome records from a CSV file.
AppointmentRequest
Represents an appointment request in the healthcare system.
AppointmentRequestService
Service class for handling appointment requests in the healthcare system.
AppointmentService
Service class for managing appointments in a hospital management system.
AppointmentStatus
Enum representing the various statuses an appointment can have.
AppointmentsView
The AppointmentsView class provides a view for displaying and managing scheduled appointments.
Billing
Represents a billing record for a patient's appointment.
BillingController
The BillingController class handles the billing and payment processes for appointments.
BillingService
Service class for calculating bills for appointments, including charges for consultations and medications.
Doctor
Represents a doctor in the healthcare system, extending the User class.
DoctorController
Controller class for handling operations related to doctors.
DoctorService
Service class for managing doctors, including operations for loading, saving, updating doctor information, and handling appointment requests.
DoctorView
The DoctorView class provides a user interface for doctors to manage their operations.
IAdministratorView
The IAdministratorView interface defines the methods that the administrator view must implement to interact with the administrator and display various information.
IAppointmentRequestService
Interface for appointment request service operations.
IAppointmentService
Interface for appointment-related service operations.
IDoctorService
Interface for doctor-related service operations.
IDoctorView
Interface for doctor-related view operations.
IInventoryService
The IInventoryService interface defines the methods for managing the hospital's inventory, including adding, updating, and removing medications, as well as handling stock levels and replenishment requests.
IMedicalRecordService
Interface for managing medical records in the system.
Inventory
Represents the inventory of a medicine in the healthcare system.
InventoryDataStore
The InventoryDataStore class is responsible for managing the inventory data.
InventoryDisplay
Represents the display information for a medicine in the inventory system.
InventoryService
The InventoryService class provides methods for managing medication inventory, including loading and saving inventory data from/to a CSV file, submitting replenishment requests, updating stock levels, and viewing current inventory.
InventoryStatus
Enumeration representing the status of medical inventory.
iPatientService
Interface for managing patient-related operations in the system.
iPatientView
Interface for defining the patient view operations.
IPharmacistService
Interface for pharmacist service operations.
IPharmacistView
Interface for pharmacist view operations.
IProjectAdmService
The IProjectAdmService interface defines the methods for managing both hospital staff and inventory, including adding, updating, and removing staff and inventory items.
IScheduleService
Interface for managing doctor schedules, including booking, canceling, and setting availability or unavailability for appointments.
IUserService
Interface for user-related services, including login, password management, and retrieving user roles.
ManageHospStaff
The ManageHospStaff class implements the IAdministratorView interface and provides methods for managing hospital staff, including adding, updating, and removing staff, as well as displaying the staff list.
MedicalInventoryView
The MedicalInventoryView class provides a user interface for displaying the medical inventory.
MedicalRecord
Represents a patient's medical record in the healthcare system.
MedicalRecordService
The MedicalRecordService class provides services to manage medical records for patients.
MedicalRecordsView
The MedicalRecordsView class provides a view for displaying medical records of patients.
MedicalRecordView
MedicalRecordView provides the functionality to display a patient's medical records.
Medication
Represents a medication item in the healthcare system.
MedicationStatus
Enumeration representing the status of a patient's medication.
MedicineConsultation
Represents a combination of medicine and consultation pricing information.
Patient
The `Patient` class represents a patient in the hospital management system.
PatientController
Controller class for managing patient-related operations.
PatientMedicalRecordView
The PatientMedicalRecordView class provides a user interface for displaying a patient's medical records.
PatientService
Service class to manage operations related to patients.
PatientView
The PatientView class provides the user interface for patients.
PaymentLogger
The `PaymentLogger` class provides functionality to log and retrieve payment details associated with appointments in a hospital management system.
PendingAppointmentRequestView
The PendingAppointmentRequestView class provides a user interface for displaying pending appointment requests for a specific doctor.
PersonalScheduleView
The PersonalScheduleView class provides a user interface for displaying the personal schedule of a doctor.
Pharmacist
Represents a pharmacist in the healthcare system.
PharmacistController
Controller class for handling pharmacist-related operations.
PharmacistService
Service class for managing pharmacists and their interactions with appointments, inventory, and medications.
PharmacistView
The PharmacistView class provides a user interface for pharmacists to interact with the system.
ProjectAdminService
The ProjectAdminService class implements the IProjectAdmService interface and provides methods for managing both staff and inventory.
ReplenishmentController
Controller class for managing replenishment requests.
ReplenishmentRequest
The `ReplenishmentRequest` class models a request for replenishing low-stock medicines.
ReplenishmentService
Service class for managing replenishment requests in the healthcare system.
ReplenishmentStatus
Enumeration representing the status of a replenishment request for inventory.
Schedule
Represents a schedule for a doctor in the healthcare system.
ScheduleService
The ScheduleService class manages the scheduling of appointments for doctors.
Staff
The Staff class represents a staff member in the hospital system, including their personal details and role.
StaffDataStore
The StaffDataStore class is responsible for managing staff data, including loading from and writing to a CSV file.
StaffView
The StaffView class implements the IAdministratorView interface and provides methods for displaying the hospital staff list.
StatusEnum
Enum representing the status of various entities such as requests or tasks.
SubmitReplenishmentRequest
The SubmitReplenishmentRequest class represents a request to replenish the stock of a specific medication.
SubmittedRequestView
The SubmittedRequestView class provides a user interface for pharmacists to submit replenishment requests for medications.
UpcomingAppointmentsView
The UpcomingAppointmentsView class provides a user interface for displaying upcoming appointments for a specific doctor.
User
Represents a user in the hospital system, with attributes for hospital ID, password, and role.
UserController
Controller class for handling user-related operations.
UserRole
Enum representing the roles of users in the system.
UserService
Service class for managing user data and providing user-related functionality.
UserView
The UserView class is responsible for handling the user interface for the Hospital Management System (HMS).
ViewAndManageInventory
The ViewAndManageInventory class implements the IAdministratorView interface and provides methods for viewing and managing the inventory, including adding, removing, updating stock levels, and handling replenishment requests.
